Detailed Description

Configuration handler.

This abstract class reads configution from file ort database, and fills and reads the global datastructure with config items

Author:
Oscar van Eijk, Oveas Functionality Provider
Version:
Aug 20, 2008 -- O van Eijk -- initial version

Member Function Documentation

ConfigHandler::read_config ( $  file = ''  ) 

Find out what the filename of the logfile should be

ConfigHandler::convert ( $  val  )  [private]

Convert values in character string format to a known value

Parameters:
[in] $val The value as read from the config file
Returns:
Value in the desired format (or as is if nothing set)

ConfigHandler::get ( $  item  ) 

Return a configuration value. Note! In order to use hidden values properly, this is the ONLY way configuration values should be retrieved!

Parameters:
[in] $item The configuration item in the same format as it appears in the configuration file (e.g. 'group|subject|item')
Returns:
Corresponding value of null when nothing was found
